In this document we perform gene-set enrichment analysis.
The data here will be referenced using the name ``r unlist(strsplit(getwd(), "/"))[8]``.

```{r}
packages <- c(
  "conflicted", "Seurat", "scuttle", "edgeR", "DT", "ComplexHeatmap", "GSEABase", "GSVA", "biomaRt",
  "volcano3D"
)
invisible(suppressPackageStartupMessages(lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE)))
source(file.path("..", "utils.R"))
conflict_prefer("cpm", "edgeR", quiet = TRUE)

analysis_no <- 5
data_name <- unlist(strsplit(getwd(), "/"))[8] # Name of dataset.
data_dir <- file.path("..", "..", "data") # Backed up data.
results_dir <- file.path("..", "..", "results")

mart <- useEnsembl("ensembl", "hsapiens_gene_ensembl")
attributes <- c("external_gene_name", "ensembl_gene_id")

# Unique cache directory for each analysis number.
# ------------------------------------------------
cache_dir <- file.path("..", "..", "cache", data_name, paste0("0", analysis_no))
if (!dir.exists(cache_dir)) {
  dir.create(cache_dir, recursive = TRUE)
}
# ------------------------------------------------

knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 12, fig.height = 7, dpi = 36)
```

# Excitatory Neuron

```{r}
sub_name <- "Ex"
seurat_list <- readRDS(
  file.path(cache_dir, "..", "03", paste(sub_name, "seurat_list.rds", sep = "_"))
)
```

## D120

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(
  results,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "05-GSE",
    paste(
      sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats",
      "AllOntologies", "GSE.csv", sep = "-"
    )
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(results)

sub_ontology <- getGmt(
  file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.GO:BP.ENSG.gmt")
)
GO_BP <- c()
for (i in seq(length(sub_ontology@.Data))) {
  GO_BP <- append(GO_BP, sub_ontology[[i]]@shortDescription)
}

sub_ontology <- getGmt(
  file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.GO:MF.ENSG.gmt")
)
GO_MF <- c()
for (i in seq(length(sub_ontology@.Data))) {
  GO_MF <- append(GO_MF, sub_ontology[[i]]@shortDescription)
}

sub_ontology <- getGmt(
  file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.GO:CC.ENSG.gmt")
)
GO_CC <- c()
for (i in seq(length(sub_ontology@.Data))) {
  GO_CC <- append(GO_CC, sub_ontology[[i]]@shortDescription)
}

sub_ontology <- getGmt(
  file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.REAC.ENSG.gmt")
)
REAC <- c()
for (i in seq(length(sub_ontology@.Data))) {
  REAC <- append(REAC, sub_ontology[[i]]@shortDescription)
}
```

#### WT < HET < HOM

```{r}
tests_up <- tests[tests[ , 1] == -1 & tests[ , 2] == 1 & tests[ , 3] == 1, ]
up <- results[rownames(results) %in% rownames(tests_up), ]

write.csv(
  up,
  file.path(
    results_dir,
    "comb",
    "05-GSE",
    paste(
      sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "WT<HET<HOM",
      "AllOntologies", "GSE.csv", sep = "-"
    )
  )
)
datatable_download_exp(up)

if (nrow(up) > 25) {
  mat <- gsva[which(rownames(gsva) %in% rownames(up)[1:25]), ]
  mat <- t(apply(mat, 1, function (x) ((2 * (x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))) - 1)))
  set.seed(1)
  draw(
    Heatmap(
      mat,
      column_order = c(5, 6, 1, 2, 3, 4),
      column_names_rot = 45,
      row_names_max_width = max_text_width(rownames(mat)),
      heatmap_legend_param = list(
        title = "Per-row Scaled ssGSEA Enrichment", direction = "horizontal",
        legend_width = unit(7.5, "cm")
      )
    ),
    heatmap_legend_side = "top"
  )
} else if (nrow(up) > 1) {
  mat <- gsva[which(rownames(gsva) %in% rownames(up)), ]  
  mat <- t(apply(mat, 1, function (x) ((2 * (x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))) - 1)))
  set.seed(1)
  draw(
    Heatmap(
      mat,
      column_order = c(5, 6, 1, 2, 3, 4),
      column_names_rot = 45,
      row_names_max_width = max_text_width(rownames(mat)),
      heatmap_legend_param = list(
        title = "Per-row Scaled ssGSEA Enrichment", direction = "horizontal",
        legend_width = unit(7.5, "cm")
      )
    ),
    heatmap_legend_side = "top"
  )
}
```

```{r}
)

)
```

### Upper Layer

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Upper Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]
```

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Deep Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(

)
```

```{r}
)

polar <- polar_coords(
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
```

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Upper Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(

  )
)
```

```{r}
)

polar <- polar_coords(
```

### Deep Layer

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Deep Layer")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]
```

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "Ex Newborn")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]
```

```{r}
DEGs <- c(HET, HOM, WT, HET_plus_HOM, HOM_plus_WT, WT_plus_HET)

rownames(design) <- colnames(gsva)
results <- results[match(rownames(gsva), rownames(results)), ]

p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(gsva), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1

seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]@active.ident <- factor(
  seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype, c("WT", "HET", "HOM")
)
```

### All Cells

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(

    paste(
      sub_name, names(seurat_list[seurat_idx]), "AllCells", "AllStats",

    )

)
```

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Astrocyte")

sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")

} else {

  )

  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {

    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]
```

```{r}
p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(gsva), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Late

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Late")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]
```

```{r}
sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$sample
sce$genotype <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- seurat_list[[seurat_idx]]$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]

write.csv(

)
```

```{r}
p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,
    P.value.HET...WT = results$P.value.HET...WT,
    P.value.HOM...WT = results$P.value.HOM...WT
  )
)
p_adj_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(gsva), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {
  radial_ggplot(polar, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
} else {
  radial_ggplot(polar, 2, label_rows = DEGs, colour_code_labels = TRUE, marker_size = 2)
}
```

### Astrocyte

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Astrocyte")

sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts = GetAssayData(sub_seurat, slot = "counts")))
sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")
if (file.exists(rds)) {
  gene_sets <- readRDS(rds)
} else {
  gene_sets <- getGmt(
    file.path(data_dir, "gene-lists", "gprofiler_hsapiens.ENSG", "hsapiens.comb.ENSG.gmt")
  )
  keep <- filterGeneSets(gene_sets, 5, 50)
  gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]
  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]
```

```{r}
sub_seurat <- subset(seurat_list[[seurat_idx]], clustermap_names_short == "RG Late")

sce$sample <- sub_seurat$sample
sce$genotype <- sub_seurat$genotype
sce$clustermap_names <- sub_seurat$clustermap_names

sce <- suppressWarnings(aggregateAcrossCells(sce, sce$sample))
keep <- filterByExpr(counts(sce), group = sce$genotype, min.total.count = 10)
sce <- sce[keep, ]
dge <- DGEList(counts(sce))
dge <- calcNormFactors(dge)
logcounts(sce, withDimnames = FALSE) <- cpm(dge, log = TRUE, prior.count = 3)

rds <- file.path(cache_dir, "filtered_comb_ENSG.rds")

} else {

  )

  for (i in seq(length(gene_sets@.Data))) {
    go_id <- gene_sets[[i]]@setName
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@setName <- gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription)
    suppressWarnings(gene_sets[[i]]@shortDescription <- go_id)
  }
  if (any(duplicated(names(gene_sets))) == TRUE) {
    remove <- which(duplicated(names(gene_sets)))
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("positive regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("negative regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("regulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("downregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("inhibition of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("termination of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("activation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("maintenance of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  remove <- grep("upregulation of", names(gene_sets))
  if (length(remove) > 0) {
    gene_sets <- gene_sets[-remove]
  }
  saveRDS(gene_sets, rds)
}

gene_anno <- getBM(attributes, "external_gene_name", rownames(sce), mart)
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

tmp <- lapply(
  geneIds(gene_sets), function(x, y) na.omit(fastmatch::fmatch(x, y)), gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
)
tmp <- filterGeneSets(tmp, 5, 50)
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(tmp)]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))))
tmp <- rowSums(overlap)
tmp <- tmp[order(tmp, decreasing = TRUE)]
gene_sets_sorted <- gene_sets[match(names(tmp), names(gene_sets))]

overlap <- computeGeneSetsOverlapMax(gene_sets_sorted, unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets_sorted))))
overlap[upper.tri(overlap)] <- 0
diag(overlap) <- 0
keep <- apply(overlap, 1, max)
keep <- keep[keep < 0.75]
gene_sets <- gene_sets[names(gene_sets) %in% names(keep)]

gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id %in% unique(unlist(geneIds(gene_sets))), ]

dup <- gene_anno[duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name), ]
if (nrow(dup) > 0) {
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(gene_anno)[1]) {
      if (dup$ensembl_gene_id[i] == gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id[j]) {
        gene_anno$external_gene_name[j] <- paste0(gene_anno$external_gene_name[j], "-alt")
      }
    }
  }
  if (any(duplicated(gene_anno$external_gene_name))) {
    stop("Duplicates in gene_anno.")
  }
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
  for (i in 1:dim(dup)[1]) {
    for (j in 1:dim(sce)[1]) {
      if (dup$external_gene_name[i] == rownames(sce)[j]) {
        new_row <- logcounts(sce[j, ])
        rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "-alt")
        if (rownames(new_row) %in% rownames(new_mat)) {
          rownames(new_row) <- paste0(rownames(new_row), "2")
        }
        new_mat <- rbind(new_mat, new_row)
      }
    }
  }
} else {
  sce <- sce[rownames(sce) %in% gene_anno$external_gene_name, ]
  new_mat <- logcounts(sce)
}
gene_anno <- gene_anno[gene_anno$external_gene_name %in% rownames(new_mat), ]
gene_anno <- gene_anno[order(match(gene_anno$external_gene_name, rownames(new_mat))), ]

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$ensembl_gene_id
sce_ENSG <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rownames(new_mat) <- gene_anno$external_gene_name
sce_name <- SingleCellExperiment(list(logcounts = new_mat))

rm(new_mat)

gsva <- gsva(
  logcounts(sce_ENSG), gene_sets, method = "ssgsea", ssgsea.norm = FALSE, verbose = FALSE
)

design <- model.matrix(~ 0 + sce$genotype)
colnames(design) <- unique(sce$genotype)
fit <- lmFit(gsva, design)
contrast_mat <- makeContrasts(HET-HOM, HET-WT, HOM-WT, levels = design)
cont_fit <- eBayes(contrasts.fit(fit, contrast_mat), trend = TRUE)
tests <- decideTests(cont_fit, "global")
write.fit(
  cont_fit, tests, adjust = "BH", method = "global", file = file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv")
)
results <- read.delim(file.path(cache_dir, "results.tsv"))
rownames(results) <- results$X
results <- results[ , -1]
results <- results[order(results$F.p.value), ]
```

```{r}
p_mat <- as.matrix(
  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.HET...HOM = results$P.value.HET...HOM,

  )
)

  data.frame(
    F.p.value = results$F.p.value,
    P.value.adj.HET...HOM = results$P.value.adj.HET...HOM,
    P.value.adj.HET...WT = results$P.value.adj.HET...WT,
    P.value.adj.HOM...WT = results$P.value.adj.HOM...WT
  )
)

polar <- polar_coords(
  design$genotype, t(gsva), p_mat, p_adj_mat, labs = unique(design$genotype)
)

if (any(is.na(DEGs))) {

}
```

```{r}
seurat_idx <- 1
```
